'''"Clouds East of Bishui"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Clouds East of Bishui" is obtainable from the [[Adeptal Mirror]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Fir Wood = 8
|Fabric = 2
|Blue Dye = 2
|sort = Fir Wood;Fabric;Blue Dye
}}
